fermentables.notes: Crisp Flagon Variety. Light golden colour & sweet wort.
fermentables.name: Extra Pale Ale (Lager) Malt

fermentables.notes: Munich malts are produced on a conventional kiln and provide golden through to orange hues
fermentables.name: Light Munich Malt
Crystal Extra Dark
fermentables.notes: The beautiful rich brown of the grain gives an insight to the exquisite dried fruit and burnt sugar flavours that are imparted by this expertly crafted dark crystal. Used in small amounts, this malt will help balance flavour and colour in dark beers whilst enhancing head retention.
Special de- husked barley malt adds aroma, colour and body, with a mild. smooth flavour. Use at a rate of 1-5 % to create a deeper aroma of dark beers as well as beer colour.
fermentables.name: Carafa Special Type 3
fermentables.usedIn: Dark Beer, “Salvator Bockbier”, Stout, Porter, Alt Beer, “Bockbier” and “Schwarzbier and many others.

hops.notes: Very clean bittering hop, leaves almost no flavour used early in the boil. This is very handy for hop heavy beers with much use of late and dry hops
hops.name: Magnum
Amarillo (T90)
hops.notes: Unique very floral/spicy. Powerful aroma with good bittering quality.
Unique very floral/spicy. Powerful aroma with good bittering quality.
hops.name: Amarillo (T90)

hops.notes: Unique very floral/spicy. Powerful aroma with good bittering quality.
hops.name: Amarillo (T90)
Cascade (T90)
hops.notes: Unique very floral/spicy aroma with good bittering quality. Cascade has a unique floral/spicy aroma both in the cone form and in the beer,mainly due to abnormal levels of some of the essential oils. It is very popular with some brewers due to the unique character imparted to the finished beer, it has a“perfume like” hoppy flavour. Trial brews and tastings also show a superior bitterness quality with Cascade even at high EBU levels (40+) there is little harshness or lingering bitterness.

Citra is a special aroma hop variety and has unique and highly favoured flavour characteristics. As the name suggests its flavour descriptors include the citrus fruits lime and grapefruit, other fruity characters described as gooseberry, passion fruit, lychee as well as numerous other tropical fruits. Best used for it’s aroma in late and dry additions. There is no other hop like it.
hops.name: Citra (T90)
